recipes.name: Pupusas
recipes.description: This is Salvadorian food. It's made using corn flour and stuffed with your favorite fillin gs. Served with a slaw and red salsa along with any additional toppings you'd like.
recipes.ingredients: 1lb of maseca (corn flour), 1tsp of chicken knorr, 1/2 tsp of salt, 2tbs butter, 3c hot water, 1c cool water, filling of your choice
recipes.instructions: Mix all the dry ingredients. Work in the butter with your hands, then add all the hot water and mix. If more water is needed for consistency, slowly add the cool water. Once the dough is set, form it into balls and fill them with the fillings of your choice. Gently shape each ball into a disk and cook. Serve with salsa and slaw.

recipes.name: White Claw
recipes.instructions: Dip your claw into the chamoy sauce then Tajin. Crack open and enjoy!!
recipes.ingredients: Mango whiteclaw, but pineapple also works! Some Tajin and your favorite chamoy sauce.
